name: Used Derrick Rose Jersey
description: I wish I wasn't parting way with this Derrick Rose jersey, but I'm moving and don't have a lot of storage. It's in good conditions, no stains or anything. Hope the person who buys this loves Rose as much as I do.

name: Michael Jordan Jersey
description: Old Michael Jordan jersey that I've had for a long time. It's in decent condition, but it's been through a lot. I'm sure someone out there would love to have this in their collection.
